title: Deep Learning Model for Predicting Lung Adenocarcinoma Recurrence from Whole Slide Images

abstract: Simple Summary This study introduces a deep learning model designed to predict the 5-year recurrence risk of lung adenocarcinoma based on histopathology images. Using a dataset of 189 patients with 455 histopathology slides, our model …

title: Detection of Diabetic Retinopathy from Retinal Fundus Images by Using CNN Model ResNet-50
details: S Das, M Mishra, S Majumder - Deep Learning in Biomedical Signal and Medical …, 2025
abstract: In middle-aged and elderly persons, diabetic retinopathy (DR) is a major cause of vision impairment and irreversible blindness, and by 2030, it is predicted that there will be 191 million cases worldwide. If DR is identified in its early stages, vision …
